import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function EditAlertSetting({onClose,onUpdateUser}) { const [alertSettings, setAlertSettings] = useState({ assignTaskAlert: false, taskDueTodayAlert: false, changeDueDateAlert: false, completeTaskAlert: false, stuckAlert: false, unstuckAlert: false, weeklyAlert: false }); useEffect(() => { const fetchUserSettings = async () => { const response = await (`/api/users/`); setAlertSettings({ assignTaskAlert: response.data.assignTaskAlert, taskDueTodayAlert: response.data.taskDueTodayAlert, changeDueDateAlert: response.data.changeDueDateAlert, completeTaskAlert: response.data.completeTaskAlert, stuckAlert: response.data.stuckAlert, unstuckAlert: response.data.unstuckAlert, }); }; fetchUserSettings(); }, []); const handleCheckboxChange = (event) => { const { name, checked } = event.target; setAlertSettings((prevSettings) => ({ ...prevSettings, [name]: checked, })); }; const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); onUpdateUser(alertSettings); // await axios.put(`/api/users/${userId}/alert-settings`, { alertSettings }); // alert('Alert settings updated successfully'); }; return (
